name: The lost one
description:
"You are on post on a lighthouse, you've been the witness of a huge storm. All communication are broken with the land since then. You've decided to reach the island by boat."

made for the #HalloweenJam2016

Thanks for playing!

You can follow me on twitter @Xerxes1138

Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Interact: Right mouse button
Quit: Escape
